verses.verse: <S%H3426>Surely<s%> there is a <S%H4161>vein<s%> for the <S%H3701>silver<s%>, and a <S%H4725>place<s%> for <S%H2091>gold<s%> where they fine <S%H2212>it<s%>.
<S%H1270>Iron<s%> is <S%H3947>taken<s%> out of the <S%H6083>earth<s%>, and <S%H5154>brass<s%> is <S%H6694>molten<s%> out of the <S%H68>stone<s%>.

He <S%H7760>sets<s%> an <S%H7093>end<s%> to <S%H2822>darkness<s%>, and searches <S%H2713>out<s%> all <S%H8503>perfection<s%>: the <S%H68>stones<s%> of <S%H652>darkness<s%>, and the shadow of <S%H6757>death<s%>.

The <S%H5158>flood<s%> breaks <S%H6555>out<s%> from the <S%H1481>inhabitant<s%>; even the waters <S%H7911>forgotten<s%> of the <S%H7272>foot<s%>: they are dried <S%H1809>up<s%>, they are gone <S%H5128>away<s%> from <S%H582>men<s%>.
As for the <S%H776>earth<s%>, out of it <S%H3318>comes<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%>: and under it is turned <S%H2015>up<s%> as it were <S%H784>fire<s%>.
The <S%H68>stones<s%> of it are the <S%H4725>place<s%> of <S%H5601>sapphires<s%>: and it has <S%H6083>dust<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%>.
There is a <S%H5410>path<s%> which no <S%H5861>bird<s%> <S%H3045>knows<s%>, and which the <S%H344>vulture<s%>'s <S%H5869>eye<s%> has not <S%H7805>seen<s%>:
The <S%H7830>lion<s%>'s <S%H1121>whelps<s%> have not <S%H1869>trodden<s%> <S%H7826>it<s%>, nor the fierce lion passed by <S%H5710>it<s%>.
He puts <S%H7971>forth<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> upon the <S%H2496>rock<s%>; he <S%H2015>overturns<s%> the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> by the <S%H8328>roots<s%>.
He cuts <S%H1234>out<s%> <S%H2975>rivers<s%> among the <S%H6697>rocks<s%>; and his <S%H5869>eye<s%> <S%H7200>sees<s%> every precious <S%H3366>thing<s%>.
He <S%H2280>binds<s%> the <S%H5104>floods<s%> from <S%H1065>overflowing<s%>; and the thing that is <S%H8587>hid<s%> brings he <S%H3318>forth<s%> to <S%H216>light<s%>.
But <S%H370>where<s%> shall <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> be <S%H4672>found<s%>? and where is the <S%H4725>place<s%> of <S%H998>understanding<s%>?
<S%H582>Man<s%> <S%H3045>knows<s%> not the <S%H6187>price<s%> <S%H4672>there<s%>; neither is it found in the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H2416>living<s%>.
The <S%H8415>depth<s%> <S%H559>says<s%>, It is not in <S%H3220>me<s%>: and the sea <S%H559>says<s%>, It is not with me.
It cannot be <S%H5414>gotten<s%> for <S%H5458>gold<s%>, neither shall <S%H3701>silver<s%> be <S%H8254>weighed<s%> for the price <S%H4242>there<s%>.
It cannot be <S%H5541>valued<s%> with the <S%H3800>gold<s%> of <S%H211>Ophir<s%>, with the <S%H3368>precious<s%> <S%H7718>onyx<s%>, or the <S%H5601>sapphire<s%>.
The <S%H2091>gold<s%> and the <S%H2137>crystal<s%> cannot <S%H6186>equal<s%> <S%H8545>it<s%>: and the exchange of it shall not be for <S%H3627>jewels<s%> of fine <S%H6337>gold<s%>.
No <S%H2142>mention<s%> shall be made of <S%H7215>coral<s%>, or of <S%H1378>pearls<s%>: for the <S%H4901>price<s%> of <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> is above <S%H6443>rubies<s%>.
The <S%H6357>topaz<s%> of <S%H3568>Ethiopia<s%> shall not <S%H6186>equal<s%> <S%H5541>it<s%>, neither shall it be valued with <S%H2889>pure<s%> <S%H3800>gold<s%>.
From <S%H370>Where<s%> then <S%H935>comes<s%> <S%H2451>wisdom<s%>? and where is the <S%H4725>place<s%> of <S%H998>understanding<s%>?
Seeing it is <S%H5956>hid<s%> from the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of all <S%H2416>living<s%>, and kept <S%H5641>close<s%> from the <S%H5775>birds<s%> of the <S%H8064>air<s%>.
<S%H11>Destruction<s%> and <S%H4194>death<s%> <S%H559>say<s%>, We have <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H8088>fame<s%> there with our <S%H241>ears<s%>.
<S%H430>God<s%> <S%H995>understands<s%> the <S%H1870>way<s%> <S%H3045>there<s%>, and he knows the place <S%H4725>there<s%>.
For he <S%H5027>looks<s%> to the <S%H7098>ends<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>, and <S%H7200>sees<s%> under the whole <S%H8064>heaven<s%>;
To <S%H6213>make<s%> the <S%H4948>weight<s%> for the <S%H7307>winds<s%>; and he <S%H8505>weighs<s%> the <S%H4325>waters<s%> by <S%H4060>measure<s%>.
When he <S%H6213>made<s%> a <S%H2706>decree<s%> for the <S%H4306>rain<s%>, and a <S%H1870>way<s%> for the <S%H2385>lightning<s%> of the <S%H6963>thunder<s%>:
Then did he <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H5608>it<s%>, and declare <S%H3559>it<s%>; he prepared <S%H2713>it<s%>, Yes, and searched it out.

And unto <S%H120>man<s%> he <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H3374>Behold<s%>, the fear of the <S%H136>Lord<s%>, that is <S%H2451>wisdom<s%>; and to <S%H5493>depart<s%> from <S%H7451>evil<s%> is <S%H998>understanding<s%>.
